product_name: Patagonia Capilene Mesh A/B Sports Bra
long_description: Wear the Patagonia Capilene Mesh A/B sports bra on its own for warm-weather runs or as a base layer when it's chilly. Stretchy, soft and nonrestrictive, its agile mesh wicks efficiently-doubled throughout for extra support and modesty. Comfortable straps fall to a flattering V in the back. Seamless, chafe-free construction; Patagonia Capilene Mesh A/B sports bra has been resized to provide a better fit. Colors (except black) display an interwoven graphic at the center-front.
short_description: Wear the Patagonia Capilene Mesh A/B sports bra on its own for warm-weather runs or as a base layer when it's chilly.
